snippet: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, who has tweaked Vladimir V. Putin, Russia’s president, for years, said police and regulatory checks on his businesses were so intense that he would sell them.
abstract: Aleksandr Y Lebedev, prominent Russian banker and newspaper magnate who has supported country's political opposition against Pres Vladimir V Putin, says police and regulatory checks have become so intense that he will sell all of his Russia-based assets.
lead_paragraph: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, who has tweaked Vladimir V. Putin, Russia’s president, for years, said police and regulatory checks on his businesses were so intense that he would sell them.

headline.seo: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, Putin Critic, Plans to Sell Russia-Based Assets
headline.main: Ex-K.G.B. Banker and Putin Critic Plans to Sell Assets
headline.print_headline: Putin Critic Plans to Sell His Russia-Based Assets
